software.name: ipythonnotebook
software.description: IPython provides a rich architecture for interactive computing with
software.custom_start_script:
if ! test -f /home/app/.have_profile
 then
    ipython profile create nbserver
    touch /home/app/.have_profile
fi

PID_FILE=/tmp/ipython_notebook.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh
ip=`head -1 /etc/hosts | cut -f1 `
ipython notebook   --profile=nbserver --ip=$ip --config /usr/local/etc/engines.py &
touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
pid=$!
echo $pid >$PID_FILE
wait
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
software.custom_post_install_script:
cd /home/app
 ipython profile create nbserver

pass=`echo "from IPython.lib import passwd
passwd('_Engines_Environment(notebook_password)')
exit() " | ipython  |grep Out | sed -r "s/\x1B\[([0-9]{1,2}(;[0-9]{1,2})?)?[m|K]//g"| cut -f4 -d" "`
#Ugly sed string strips color codes from python output


cat /home/app/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py | sed "/^# c.NotebookApp.password.*/s//c.NotebookApp.password=$pass/" > /tmp/confg
cp /tmp/confg /home/app/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py
